SELECT m.*, COUNT(pt.ref_idx) AS ref_idx_cnt, COUNT(mm.mem_mng_idx) AS stop_mem_idx FROM member m LEFT JOIN rep_trans pt ON pt.ref_idx = m.mem_idx LEFT JOIN mem_mng mm ON mm.mng_div = m.mem_idx WHERE 1=1
AND mem_status = #{searchType}
AND mem_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY m.mem_idx ORDER BY m.mem_joindate DESC LIMIT #{start}, 20
